ygData.subject: New Cleric Armor- SPOILERS
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings! Since being a cleric for a LONG time, and having seen the new quests go in, I thought I would say a few things. The new cleric armor is for 25-35
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings!

Since being a cleric for a LONG time, and having seen the new quests go in,
I thought I would say a few things.

The new cleric armor is for 25-35 lvl clerics to go do something and expand
the breadth of quests for these levels.

Since these quests are turning into more complex series of events (and if
they were easy we would still complain), please try to give locations of
said monsters and as much detail as you can. Thanks

So lets get to it:




SPOILER







Turgan the Reliant is in Lake Rathetear, from gnoll camp go east, first
house on the left.
PROBLEM: You need whatever it is from the hut in Kithicor before he will
talk to you.
you can ask him "What is...(Turgan the Reliant, icon of the reliant, ingot
of the reliant)"
and he comes back with, " How do you know about.....I don't know what you
are talking about. Go back to Kithicor!"

My thinking is that the Shadowed men in Kithicor has it (a 25th +- monster),
and we will find "something."

Lianna Ferasa (the gypsy woman of Rathe Mtns, she is in gypsy camp by the
lake entrance) sends you to North Karana to kill Zahal the Vile, and return
her flute to her. Zahal is in the "tree line in the east part of north
karana"

All creatures seem to have a common drop item (albeit pretty cool ala the
reed belt, Zahal dropa a SK belt), AND then a not so common Icon or Ingot
drop.


hope this helps,


Jeff
Cadfael, Erollisi Marr & Xegony
